title: Magnetic Field Simulator
text:
Magnetic Field Simulator
The aim of this is to create a program/library which will simulate and display the magnetic field of an electonic component.
Volumetric Vector Field Analysis

title: Volumetric Vector Field Analysis
text:
Code
import numpy as np

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


Try to create a volume of Magnetic field vectors to simulate there effects on circuitry. First hurdle is defining the circuit. import model from image would be great.


Code
import Field
f= Field.Field()

f.setup_plot()
f.plot_wire()
f.plot_field()
f.draw_plot()

import Field
f= Field.Field(corners=[[0,5],[5,5],[5,10]],curr=1)

f.setup_plot()
f.plot_wire()
f.plot_field()
